CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Silver
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Silver
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Silver is a bright, lustrous metal renowned for its conductivity, beauty, and symbolic purity. While soft and malleable, it remains a staple in crafting, electronics, and currency.
